amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds by EPA to act in contravention of the Clean Air Act and requires EPA to evaluate the impact of its actions with respect to jobs in America.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 7 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in contravention of Section 321(a) of the Clean Air Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weber (TX) amendment (A089) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Weber (TX) amendment (A089) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A089) offered by Mr. Weber (TX).
